subject: Need to test a method that returns void
msgSnippet: Need to test a method that returns void . Failure of the method is by thorowing an exception. If no exception is thrown it is success. I have wrapped the
messageBody:
Need to test a method that returns 'void'. Failure of the method is by
thorowing an exception. If no exception is thrown it is success.

I have wrapped the method call in try...catch and placed
Assert.assertTrue(false) statement in the catch block. However even
when exception is thrown, this statement is not executed
and 'Succeful' message is output.

Help appreciated.

Thanks,
Venkat
